author: Spineat
title: Roasted Pumpkin Salad - Thanksgiving Dinner
text:
Intro Intro: Roasted Pumpkin Salad - Thanksgiving Dinner 
Thanksgiving Dinner – learn how to make Roasted Pumpkin Salad. Easy, Healthy and Colorful recipe that brings out the flavor and the texture of the homemade fall dinner, ... 1 Step 1: INGREDIENTS: 
400g pumpkin200g chicken breasts1 red pepper100g feta cheese½ red onion1 clove of garlic50g pumpkin seeds½ lemon1 tbsp olive oil2 tbsp soy sauce2 tsp salt2 tsp pepper1 tsp cayenne ... 2 Step 2: ROASTED PUMPKIN 
Preheat oven to 220°CCut the pumpkin into cubes and place them onto the baking tray.Drizzle pumpkin cubes with oil and season it with salt, pepper and cayenne pepper. ... 3 Step 3: ADD CHICKEN BREAST 
Meanwhile cut the chicken breast (skinless and boneless) into small pieces. Cook it in a skillet on medium high heat until fully cooked. Season it with salt and ... 4 Step 4: MIX SALAD 
Meanwhile cut a red pepper, feta cheese into cubes and half of the red onion into rings. Add them to the tray.Sprinkle the mixture with sesame, half of ... 5 Step 5: SERVE ROASTED PUMPKIN SALAD 
NUTRITION FACTS:Calories ………….. 560 kcalProtein 36 gTotal Carbs …………. 38 gTotal Fat . 22 g Thank you for reading and watching video. If you want to see ...
